name: Jetpack Cat
description:
Jetpack Cat is a heroic cat stranded on an unknown planet, but luckily enough he still has a jetpack to escape with. Help guide Jetpack Cat away from a dangerous planet full of deadly robot aliens. If you're lucky, Jetpack Cat might even reach outer space!

Jetpack Cat was originally released worldwide on the Google Play Store and the Apple App Store in 2014. Years later, after I closed Make or Break Games to join Owlchemy Labs, I could no longer prioritize supporting it. Rather than losing it to history, I'm uploading my first professional game here.

This is the Android version, so you'll need either an Android device or an emulator (I like BlueStacks) to play. The real-money store and social media functions will not work, of course.
